Detailed Description

Implements NDK NIMU transport driver interface for ICSS.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct NIMU_IcssData_s NIMU_IcssData

NIMU_IcssData.

The structure is used to store the private data for the EMAC controller.

Function Documentation

int32_t NIMU_ICSS_EmacInit ( STKEVENT_Handle  hEvent)

The EMAC Initialization Function.

The function is used to initialize and register the EMAC with the Network Interface Management Unit (NIMU)
